name: Strawberry Banana
description: Strawberry Banana is a 70/30 indica-dominant cannabis strain developed by DNA Genetics in collaboration with Serious Seeds. A genetic cross between Crockett’s Banana Kush and the “Strawberry” phenotype of Bubble Gum, Strawberry Banana inherits a sweet fruity flavor that earned this hybrid her name. Known for its heavy resin production and high THC content, Strawberry Banana produces happy, peaceful effects that sharpen creativity and sensory awareness.
descriptionPlain: Strawberry Banana is a 70/30 indica-dominant cannabis strain developed by DNA Genetics in collaboration with Serious Seeds. A genetic cross between Crockett’s Banana Kush and the “Strawberry” phenotype of Bubble Gum, Strawberry Banana inherits a sweet fruity flavor that earned this hybrid her name. Known for its heavy resin production and high THC content, Strawberry Banana produces happy, peaceful effects that sharpen creativity and sensory awareness.

highlightedReviews.text: First impression was, "wow, this really smells like banana." As soon as my budtender came out with the jar, i could just smell the sweetness.. And the flavor is just as great. Very mellow smoke, nice banana taste. The flower i got was 24.6% THC and i gotta say, i was impressed by the effects. Nice mellow affects that lasted me all morning, very nice way to start your mornings. However, i missed that giggly and happy feeling. I got more of a calm, focused feeling from it. Still a great strain.

It’s a creeper. 
And it also smells great. It smelled up my whole room with a citrusy berry aroma just from opening the bag!

Gotta be careful with this one, if you’re prone to racing thoughts with strong Sativas like me, take it a bit easy until you’ve gotten use to it. 
Made the mistake of smoking a fat ass joint all to myself and I started getting flustered over silly thoughts. 

Try the 4-7-8 breathing technique. (Inhale for 4 seconds, hold it for 7, and exhale for 8)
 tell yourself that you don’t need to think about that junk. And that you are NOT running away from problems. These racing anxious thoughts are silly, mundane, and that YOU have control over uncomfortable thoughts.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: The 2015 Michigan Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Breeders and growers duked it out last weekend in Michigan for yet another High Times Cannabis Cup. The best of the best were pitted against each other, and we're curious how many of you have had the pleasure of trying these champs. Share your thoughts in a strain review or check out where to find these elite genetics at a shop near you by navigating to their strain page and clicking "Availability."
Without further ado, here are your 2015 winners!
 
CANNABIS FLOWER WINNERS

Best Indica Flower
1st Place: Zkittlez from 3rd Gen Family with Terphogz and The Union
2nd Place: Strawberry Banana from Greenwolf Oregon with G.C. Rebellion Farms
3rd Place: Deathwalker OG from Radicle Genetics in collaboration with Lenz and Valerio
 
Best Sativa Flower
1st Place: Strawberry Banana from Mass Genetics
2nd Place: Tropicana from Cannabiotix
3rd Place: Dreamy Jones from Bud White at Interlochen Alternative Health
 
Best Hybrid Flower
1st Place: Sunshine #4 by Bodhi Seeds from The Green Room Detroit
2nd Place: Savant’s Grail from 710 Savant
3rd Place: Crown OG from Crown OG with A Detroit Alternative and Moxie 71
 
Best CBD Flower
1st Place: Perkins Cut Cannatonic from Mota Rebel Genetics
2nd Place: CBDee’s #1B from Pure West Compassion Club with LightSky Farms
3rd Place: Super Sonic CBD from Radicle Genetics in collaboration with Valerio
 
CANNABIS CONCENTRATE WINNERS

Best Indica Concentrate
1st Place: Faygo Red Pop Live Resin from 710 Savant
2nd Place: Grape Valley Kush Live Resin from PeaceOil
3rd Place: Moxie Goji Live Resin from A Detroit Alternative
 
Best Sativa Concentrate
1st Place: Clementine Live Resin from Crockett Family Farms
2nd Place: Romulan Grenade’s Live Plant Run from LightSky Farms with NLG
3rd Place: Tangie Live Resin from Greenwolf Oregon and Moxie Genetics
 
Best Hybrid Concentrate
1st Place: Strawberry Banana Lemonade from Greenwolf Oregon and Moxie 710
2nd Place: Strawberry Banana from Loud Pack Extracts Oregon with Moxie Mix
3rd Place: Crown OG from Moxie Genetics with ADA East
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Goji Rosin from Moxie Seeds & Extracts with ADA East and Foundation Extracts
2nd Place: Moxie Solventless Goji 120-micron from A Detroit Alternative
3rd Place: 73-micron Bruce Banner #3 Freeze Dried Water Hash from Michigan Made Melts in collaboration with Kushmanjockin
 
Best CBD Concentrate
1st Place: CBD Cookies / Cannatonic / Cannasphere from Kannacare in collaboration with TerpTitan
2nd Place: CBDee’s #1B Live Plant Run from Pure West Compassion Club with LightSky Farms
3rd Place: Startonic Sap from Genotype A2 with A2 Wellness
 
CANNABIS PRODUCT WINNERS

Best Cannabis Edible
1st Place: Kief Krispy from Budsuds with R.I. Finest and Kief Krispy
2nd Place: Captain Kirk’s Truffle Tropicales from Captain Kirk Edibles of Ann Arbor Health Collective
3rd Place: Got Milk? From Mindright
 
Best CBD Cannabis Edible
1st Place: Special Fx Labs CBD Dark Chocolate Mint from Jackson County Compassion Center
2nd Place: Cherry Almond Sherbet Delight – CBD Special from Arborside Delights
3rd Place: CBDee’s Strawberry Lemonade from LightSky Farms with NLG
 
Best Cannabis Topical
1st Place: PBO from PBOHeals.com
2nd Place: Budsuds Purple Chem Topical Soap Bar from Budsuds with R.I. Finest and The Cali Connection
3rd Place: Truu Hemp Infused Lotion from Mindright
 
Best Cannabis Product
1st Place: MOXIE | Moxie Mix
2nd Place: Raw Papers | HBI
3rd Place: Advanced Nutrients | Advanced Nutrients
 
Best Glass
1st Place: We Grow Michigan | Joe P x SD Ryno “Devil Duck Bot”
2nd Place: Sacred Expressions | The Collector
3rd Place: Nexus Glass | Tesla V3
 
Best Vaporizer
1st Place: Puff Co | Puff Co
2nd Place: VaporZ | VaporZ
3rd Place: WildBill’s Tobacco | Honey Pen

growInfo.growNotes:
Yields around 450 to 550 grams per meter squared
	Responds well to topping
	Medium to heavy feeder
